en.sc1: This is an Employee entity with Unary 1:M relation[Manage] with itself. (i.e. Some employees are managers and the other are subordinate employees , Each employee can be a manager for one or more employee of his colleagues, But each employee can only have one manager )
en.sc2: Now, How can we physically implement this relationship? New column will be added to the Employee entity to represent the relationship [Manage] relationship
en.sc3: Which is true using the foreign key(Emp-id) for referring to the manager-id OR subordinate employee?? Let's try to know
